tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE AdvertisingRevenueTrends (ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ad_title VARCHAR(255), revenue DECIMAL(10,2), ad_type VARCHAR(50), ad_placement VARCHAR(50), ad_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_budget DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    campaign_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    clicks INT NOT NULL,
    impressions INT NOT NULL,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    revenue_generated DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_revenue (
    ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name TEXT,
    ad_type TEXT,
    ad_cost DECIMAL,
    revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaign (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE advertiser (
    advertiser_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    advertiser_name TEXT,
    industry TEXT,
    country TEXT,
    contact_person TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    ad_id UUID,
    campaign_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    clicks INTEGER,
    impressions INTEGER,
    sales DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    ad_id INT,
    date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (ad_id, date)
);
